Summary: Master–detail navigation with a flyout menu and a detail page. Swap detail content based on user selection.
Remarks: FlyoutPage manages two related pages: a flyout (menu) and a detail (content). In MauiReactor, provide the menu via .Flyout(...) and render the detail based on app state (e.g., an enum). Typical pattern: a CollectionView in the flyout to select a section, and a NavigationPage hosting the detail. Handle selection with .OnSelected<CollectionView, T>(...) or .OnSelectionChanged to update state and re-render the detail page.
